attributes.action: Re-instate the word "faggot" in the song "Fairy Tale of New York" by Radio 1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Radio 1 have censored the word faggot in this very popular Christmas song. This not a decision that covers all BBC stations - Radio 2 will continue to play the unedited version. This is a ludicrous decision and ruins a classic, true Christmas song and must be reversed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
